title: My life in the war years = My life during the war years

abstract: When war broke out, we all got busy. War affected everyone, even those at home
description: May Donovan was a young woman when World War II broke out. She speaks about her life in Melbourne and how she was affected by the war, despite being so far away. She is a member of the Victorian War Widows Guild and created this digital story in memory of Pat Medaris
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001753; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [June 2009]; Active; 2009
